=JBookShelf 0.5b0=

[http://jbookshelf.googlecode.com/files/jbookshelf-linux-0.5b0.zip Download for Linux] 
[http://jbookshelf.googlecode.com/files/jbookshelf-windows-0.5b0.zip Download for Windows]

==Changes==

 * Moved back to Java Swing [http://code.google.com/p/jbookshelf/issues/detail?id=81 see]
 * Memory storage and xml persistence using EMF replaced with DB persistence using [http://www.h2database.com/ H2 DB] and Hibernate
 * Model simplyfied
 * GUI and features review
 * Huge code reorganizing

==Fixed==

 * Opening the file zipped with a nonsystem encoding may cause an error
